bills.title: Enhances penalty for failure to stop and report hitting, running over, or injuring of certain animals with motor vehicle where animal is killed.
bills.last_action: Introduced in the Senate, Referred to Senate Environment and Energy Committee

bills.title: Modifies process for obtaining working certificates for minors.
bills.last_action: Introduced in the Senate, Referred to Senate Labor Committee

bills.title: Establishes standards for expiration of rental housing affordability controls.
Authorizes imposition of fee for connection to municipal electric distribution system.
bills.last_action: Introduced in the Senate, Referred to Senate Community and Urban Affairs Committee

bills.title: Requires commissioner of registration to move voters with undeliverable mail-in ballots to inactive file; removes such inactive voters from Statewide voter registration system following failure to vote in two consecutive federal general elections.
bills.last_action: Introduced in the Senate, Referred to Senate State Government, Wagering, Tourism & Historic Preservation Committee
